Notes: 18"/42 Mark II - Improved Mark I, lighter construction, proposed G3 battlecruiser. Shell: 3,320 lbs. MV: 2,350 fps. Never built (Washington Treaty 1922). Range: 42,000 yds. Fictional design study.
18"/45 Mark III - Wartime experimental. All-steel construction. Shell: 3,450 lbs super-heavy. MV: 2,500 fps. Proposed Lion-class (cancelled 1944). Range: 44,500 yds. Fictional design.
16"/45 Mark II - Post-Nelson design study. Improved wire-wound. Shell: 2,048 lbs. MV: 2,575 fps. Barrel life: 350 rounds. Fictional design study.
16"/45 Mark III - Pre-war all-steel. Shell: 2,120 lbs heavier AP. MV: 2,525 fps. Proposed pre-war Lion-class. Barrel life: 380 rounds. Fictional.
16"/45 Mark IV - Wartime simplified. Shell: 2,048 lbs. MV: 2,525 fps. Proposed 1943 Lion-class (cancelled). Weight: 109 tons. Fictional.
15"/42 Mark II - 1920s modernization. Supercharge from outset. Shell: 1,938 lbs. MV: 2,670 fps. Barrel life: 350 rounds. Weight: 98.5 tons. Fictional.
15"/42 Mark III - Treaty-compliant, upgradeable to 16". Shell: 1,938 lbs. MV: 2,640 fps. All-steel construction. Proposed 1930s designs. Fictional.
15"/45 Mark IV - Longer barrel L/45. Shell: 1,938 lbs. MV: 2,750 fps. Range: 39,000 yds. Proposed 1937 Lion-class. Barrel life: 320 rounds. Fictional.
15"/42 Mark V - Wartime simplified. Shell: 1,938 lbs. MV: 2,640 fps. Emergency battleship construction. Weight: 99 tons. Fictional.
14"/45 Mark VIII - Improved Mark VII reliability. Fixed KGV mechanism issues. Shell: 1,590 lbs. MV: 2,483 fps. ROF: 2.5 rpm (improved). Fictional wartime lessons.
14"/45 Mark IX - Lightweight variant. Improved metallurgy. Shell: 1,590 lbs. MV: 2,483 fps. Weight: 75 tons (4.6 tons lighter). Autofrettage. Fictional.
14"/50 Mark X - Cold War modernization. Longer barrel L/50. Shell: 1,590 lbs. MV: 2,650 fps. Range: 38,500 yds. Proposed Vanguard refit. Barrel life: 400 rounds. Fictional.
13.5"/45 Mark VI - Interwar modernization. Shell: 1,400 lbs. MV: 2,575 fps (75 fps improvement). Proposed Iron Duke modernization. Barrel life: 280 rounds. Fictional.
13.5"/50 Mark VII - Experimental high-velocity. Longer L/50. Shell: 1,400 lbs. MV: 2,700 fps. Range: 32,000 yds. Late-WWI experimental. All-steel trial. Fictional.
12"/50 Mark XIII - Consolidated XI/XI*/XII. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,825 fps. Barrel life: 280 rounds (improved). Proposed 1912-1913 designs. Fictional.
12"/50 Mark XIV - WWI high-velocity. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,900 fps. Range: 28,500 yds. Wire-wound. Barrel life: 260 rounds. Fictional.
12"/50 Mark XV - Interwar weight reduction. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,825 fps. Weight: 60 tons. All-steel trial. Proposed pre-dreadnought refit. Fictional.
12"/50 Mark XVI - Pre-WWII large cruiser gun. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. All-steel radial. Proposed 1937-1938 designs. Fictional.
12"/45 Mark XVII - Wartime emergency, shorter barrel. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,700 fps. Range: 25,000 yds. Proposed emergency cruiser. Fictional.
12"/50 Mark XVIII - Post-war, chromium plating. Shell: 850 lbs. MV: 2,825 fps. Barrel life: 350 rounds. Proposed 1950s cruisers. Fictional.
10"/40 Mark I - Pre-dreadnought heavy cruiser. Wire-wound. Shell: 500 lbs. MV: 2,500 fps. Range: 18,000 yds. Proposed armored cruisers 1900-1905. Fictional.
10"/45 Mark II - Dreadnought-era. Shell: 500 lbs. MV: 2,650 fps. Range: 20,500 yds. Battle cruiser secondary proposed. ROF: 2.5 rpm. Fictional.
10"/45 Mark III - WWI high-velocity. Shell: 500 lbs. MV: 2,700 fps. Range: 22,000 yds. Barrel life: 240 rounds. Proposed WWI cruisers. Fictional.
10"/50 Mark IV - Interwar large cruiser. Longer L/50. Shell: 500 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Range: 24,500 yds. All-steel. ROF: 3 rpm. Fictional.
9.2"/40 Mark I - Armored cruiser era. Wire-wound. Shell: 380 lbs. MV: 2,300 fps. Range: 16,000 yds. Ships: proposed Duke of Edinburgh-class. ROF: 2 rpm. Fictional variant.
9.2"/45 Mark II - Improved variant. Shell: 380 lbs. MV: 2,450 fps. Range: 18,500 yds. Proposed cruiser secondary. Barrel life: 220 rounds. Fictional.
9.2"/50 Mark III - WWI heavy cruiser main gun. Longer L/50. Shell: 380 lbs. MV: 2,600 fps. Range: 21,000 yds. All-steel construction. ROF: 2.5 rpm. Fictional.
8"/50 Mark IX - Post-County improved. Shell: 256 lbs. MV: 2,750 fps (25 fps improvement). Barrel life: 580 EFC. Proposed improved Counties. ROF: 5 rpm. Fictional.
8"/50 Mark X - 1930s improved design. Shell: 256 lbs. MV: 2,725 fps. Faster traverse 4°/sec. All Mark II turrets (+50° elev). Proposed treaty cruisers. Fictional.
8"/55 Mark XI - Pre-war modernization. Longer L/55. Shell: 256 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Range: 32,000 yds. Proposed 1938 cruisers. Barrel life: 550 EFC. Fictional.
8"/50 Mark XII - Wartime simplified. Shell: 256 lbs. MV: 2,725 fps. Reduced peacetime standards. Proposed emergency cruisers. ROF: 4.5 rpm. Fictional.
7.5"/45 Mark I - Heavy destroyer/light cruiser proposal. Shell: 200 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Range: 24,000 yds. 1920s "super destroyer" concept. ROF: 6 rpm. Fictional.
7.5"/50 Mark II - Dual-purpose variant. Shell: 200 lbs. MV: 2,900 fps. Elev: 70°. Proposed destroyer leader main gun. ROF: 6-8 rpm. Fictional.
7.5"/50 Mark III - Wartime production. Shell: 200 lbs. MV: 2,900 fps. Simplified Mark II. Proposed emergency cruisers. Barrel life: 350 rounds. Fictional.
6"/45 Mark IX - WWI improved variant. Shell: 100 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Proposed light cruisers. Wire-wound. ROF: 7 rpm. Barrel life: 800 EFC. Fictional.
6"/45 Mark X - Post-WWI modernization. Shell: 100 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Weight reduction: 0.3 tons. Proposed cruiser refits. ROF: 7-8 rpm. Fictional.
6"/50 Mark XI - Interwar high-velocity. Longer L/50. Shell: 112 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Range: 26,500 yds. Proposed treaty cruisers. Fictional.
6"/45 Mark XIII - 1920s design. Shell: 100 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. All-steel construction trial. Proposed County-class secondary. ROF: 8 rpm. Fictional.
6"/50 Mark XIV - Treaty cruiser variant. Shell: 112 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Proposed Arethusa-class alternative. Barrel life: 1,200 EFC. Fictional.
6"/50 Mark XV - Pre-war variant. Shell: 112 lbs. MV: 2,760 fps. Proposed Edinburgh-class. ROF: 8 rpm. Lighter weight. Fictional.
6"/50 Mark XVII - Wartime simplified. Shell: 112 lbs. MV: 2,760 fps. Reduced machining. Proposed emergency cruisers. ROF: 7.5 rpm. Fictional.
6"/50 Mark XVIII - Post-war automated. Shell: 112 lbs. MV: 2,760 fps. Power loading. ROF: 12 rpm automated. Proposed Tiger-class. Fictional.
5.25"/50 Mark III - Improved KGV secondary. Fixed cramped mount issues. Shell: 80 lbs. MV: 2,672 fps. ROF: 10 rpm sustained. Proposed Lion-class. Fictional.
5.25"/55 Mark IV - Cold War modernization. Longer L/55. Shell: 80 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Automated loading. ROF: 15 rpm. Proposed 1950s refits. Fictional.
5"/45 Mark I - Destroyer/frigate main gun. Shell: 62 lbs. MV: 2,700 fps. Elev: 80°. Proposed emergency destroyers. ROF: 18 rpm. Dual-purpose. Fictional.
5"/50 Mark II - Post-war automated. Shell: 62 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Longer L/50. Power loading. ROF: 22 rpm. Proposed Weapon-class. Fictional.
5"/50 Mark III - 1950s modernization. Shell: 62 lbs. MV: 2,850 fps. Remote control. ROF: 20 rpm. Proposed frigate main gun. Fictional.
5"/54 Mark IV - Cold War variant. Shell: 62 lbs. MV: 2,950 fps. Fully automated. ROF: 25 rpm. Proposed County-class alternative. Fictional.
4.7"/45 Mark XIII - Late-war improved. Shell: 50 lbs. MV: 2,650 fps. Improved elevation 60°. Proposed Battle-class variant. ROF: 17 rpm. Fictional.
4.7"/50 Mark XIV - Post-war variant. Shell: 50 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Longer L/50. Power loading. ROF: 18 rpm. Proposed destroyer refits. Fictional.
4.7"/50 Mark XV - 1950s modernization. Shell: 50 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Automated loading. ROF: 20 rpm. Proposed Tribal-class refit. Fictional.
4.5"/45 Mark VII - Emergency Programme variant. Shell: 55 lbs. MV: 2,400 fps. Simplified Mark IV. Proposed emergency destroyers. ROF: 15 rpm. Fictional.
4.5"/45 Mark VIII - Battle-class improved. Shell: 55 lbs. MV: 2,450 fps. Better ROF: 20 rpm. Power ramming. Proposed post-war destroyers. Fictional.
4.5"/50 Mark IX - Cold War variant. Shell: 55 lbs. MV: 2,600 fps. Longer L/50. Automated. ROF: 25 rpm. Proposed County-class DDG. Fictional.
4.5"/45 Mark X - Lightweight variant. Shell: 55 lbs. MV: 2,500 fps. Aluminum alloy jacket. Weight: 3.7 tons. Proposed frigate main gun. Fictional.
4"/45 Mark XVII - Late-war variant. Shell: 35 lbs. MV: 2,660 fps. Improved fuze. Proposed escort AA. ROF: 19 rpm. Fictional.
4"/50 Mark XVIII - Post-war modernization. Shell: 35 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Longer L/50. Power loading. ROF: 20 rpm. Proposed frigate AA. Fictional.
4"/50 Mark XX - 1950s automated. Shell: 35 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Fully automated. ROF: 25 rpm. Proposed escort fleet standard. Fictional.
4"/55 Mark XXII - Final Cold War variant. Shell: 35 lbs. MV: 2,950 fps. Longer L/55. Remote control. ROF: 28 rpm. Proposed AAW escorts. Fictional.
3"/50 Mark I - Light AA/secondary gun (WWII). Shell: 12.5 lbs. MV: 2,800 fps. Elev: 80°. Corvette/sloop weapon. ROF: 30 rpm. Fictional light escort gun.
